Controlled example

```js
class SearchFieldExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: "", fetch: "" };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <SearchField
          value={this.state.value}
          onChange={e => this.setState({ value: e.target.value })}
          onFetch={value => this.setState({ fetch: value })}
        />
        Fetch: {this.state.fetch}
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<SearchFieldExample />;
```

Uncontrolled example

```js
class SearchFieldExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { fetch: "" };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <SearchField onFetch={value => this.setState({ fetch: value })} />
        <div>Fetch: {this.state.fetch}</div>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<SearchFieldExample />;
```
